summary.para: The POINTFX structure contains the coordinates of points that describe the outline of a character in a TrueType font.

remarks.para: The POINTFX structure is a member of the and structures. Values in the POINTFX structure are specified in device units.

summary.para: The x-component of a point on the outline of a TrueType character.
The y-component of a point on the outline of a TrueType character.
